title: Boiler 2 Fire Door
description: This fire door is the remnant of the old coal-fired boiler system. On a coal-fired boilers like Boiler 2 and Boiler 3, boiler operators use fire doors to access and provide service to the chain grate stoker inside. On March 4, 2020, the university switched to natural gas to comply with state regulation, reduce operation cost, and make the campus more sustainable.
